local_intent: Compliant place of the held green_bottle to the preset 'place_on_table' pose at yaw 0, verifying contact.
assumptions: Object is already grasped and held stably.
coherence_with_global: Implements the place phase of the GLOBAL_BT using the same PlaceAt parameters (pose_key=place_on_table, yaw=0, press_force=10, timeout=1500). Adds minimal alignment (SetTCPYaw) and verifies contact after compliant placement, consistent with the global description of a compliant place.
